channel.title: Juhee Sung-Schenck on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Juhee Sung-Schenck on Home

description.ul:
Web scraped tweets from various disasters including earthquakes, hurricanes, and wildfires
Formulated several functions to engineer features and to produce geolocation within given radius
Constructed a supervised learning model that distinguishes whether the tweet is related to a disaster with 89% accuracy score, and an unsupervised learning model with 85%
Designed an application with Flask to correctly pinpoint the area on the map with keywords provided by users Link to this project’s GitHub repository

Generated an unstructured dataset by scraping 6,000 reddit posts in 2 subreddits
Used natural language processing transformers to make the dataset mathematically analyzable and interpretable
Identified most commonly used words in each subreddit using word vectorizers
Built a multinomial Naive Bayes classification model with a precision score of 92% Link to this project’s GitHub repository

item.title: World Happiness Data Visualization
item.description: Link to this project’s GitHub repository

description.ul:
Created intuitive data visualizations to explore the relationships between property features and sale price
Applied feature engineering techniques to manipulate the data
Assessed several linear regression models measuring its predictive power
Developed a model that was able to forecast the sale price with 92% accuracy Link to this project’s GitHub repository
